statements: SELECT * FROM customer_service_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT interaction_id, feedback FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE customer_id = '8c7cf800-7e05-4d46-be4e-892cb6ff50b9'
SELECT * FROM customer_service_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_service_interactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_service_interactions
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_service_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM customer_service_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING interaction_count > 3
SELECT interaction_type, feedback FROM customer_service_interactions WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceInteractions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerServiceInteractions WHERE agent_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_score, feedback_category FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE feedback_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerServiceInteractions LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, agent_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerServiceInteractions WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, interaction_id, feedback_date, feedback_score FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE feedback_score > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, feedback_text, feedback_category FROM CustomerServiceInteractions JOIN FeedbackAnalysis ON CustomerServiceInteractions.interaction_id = FeedbackAnalysis.interaction_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerServiceInteractions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 2 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, satisfaction_rating FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, policy_number FROM customers WHERE policy_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, interaction_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY interaction_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM interactions INNER JOIN feedback ON interactions.interaction_id = feedback.interaction_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT policy_type, start_date, customer_id FROM policies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Claim';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_rating, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_rating > 3;

SELECT customers.customer_name, policies.policy_type, feedback.feedback_text FROM customers JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN feedback ON interactions.interaction_id = feedback.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE policy_id = 101;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_time, interaction_details FROM CustomerServiceInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT policy_name, premium_amount, start_date FROM Policies WHERE premium_amount > 500.00 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM CustomerServiceInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, employee_id, interaction_date, interaction_time FROM CustomerServiceInteractions WHERE customer_id = 10 OR employee_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_id, employee_id, interaction_details FROM CustomerServiceInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC, interaction_time ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.customer_name, e.employee_name, f.rating AS feedback_rating FROM Customers c JOIN CustomerServiceInteractions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN Feedback f ON i.interaction_id = f.interaction_id JOIN Employees e ON i.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE f.rating > 3 ORDER BY f.rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.customer_name, p.policy_name, p.coverage_details FROM Customers c JOIN Policies p ON c.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE c.email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
